Applications of Circle Theorems with Marine Navigation

The earth is a big circle. We have lived there for hundred thousands of years, yet we have not explored it all...

HomeDownloadCalculator

Below is a calculator that automatically calculates the distance to the horizon. The only value you need to input is your height relative to sea level (in meters). It does all the trigonometry calculations for you!

Source code:

'use strict';

var radian = Math.acos(inputs.radius / ((inputs.height/1000) + inputs.radius));
var angle = radian * (180 / Math.PI);
var distance = Math.tan(radian) * inputs.radius;

return {
  angle: angle,
  distance: distance
};
circletheorems.github.io is maintained by Son PHS4. Project by Son and Can from PHS4.
